Title: Bridget Jones's Baby
Writer: Helen Fielding (screenplay), Dan Mazer (screenplay), Emma Thompson (screenplay), Helen Fielding (based on the characters and story created by), Helen Fielding (story by)
Actors: Renée Zellweger, Gemma Jones, Jim Broadbent, Sally Phillips
Plot: Bridget's focus on single life and her career is interrupted when she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch ... she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.
Production: Working Title Films, Perfect World Pictures
